casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Timmy Euvonne GROOMS 39A99-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 2, 2019

David Weiss, Johanna Jennings, Attorneys at Law, For Grooms, Timmy Euvonne

Danielle Marquis Elder, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, Kristy M. Newton, District Attorney, For State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of March 2019 by Defendant to Establish Deadline to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of April 2019."
